channel.title: How do you make a timer on a certain minigame 5th time asking -_-
channel.description: hi ive asked this is my 5th time asking this question before but ive never got my answer to it how do you put a countdown timer to a minigame like when the times up the games over how do you do that thanks

item.title: How do you make a timer on a certain minigame 5th time asking -_-
item.dc:creator: @eczema3 eczema3
item.description:
@eczema3 wrote:

add an int, start it at 0

public int minigameTimer = 0;

then in the void or w/e your using for the minigame just do minigameTimer = 10; to change the timer to 10.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you make a timer on a certain minigame 5th time asking -_-
